JOIN OUR DRIVE FOR SOCIAL IMPACT

Meet the people making an impact in Abu Dhabi & see how your ideas can change our society.

The Exchange by the Authority of Social Contribution Ma’an is a space for everyone.

In this social innovation platform, you can find inspiration, join a free workshop, and meet like-minded people who are passionate about helping others.

Here, you can also learn more about Ma’an, and take steps towards growing your own enterprise.
